Below is an example of an HTML page that implements the condensed clinical guideline provided, including interactive elements for decision-making: ```html Substance Use in Pregnancy Decision Guide

Questions

Guidance

``` This HTML page provides a two-column layout with interactive questions and guidance based on the user's selection and responses. The page uses basic JavaScript for interactivity and CSS for styling. Adjustments and expansions can be made based on more detailed requirements or additional content from the guideline.
